title: Create ResourceQuota
description: Create a ResourceQuota named ||compute-quota|| in namespace ||pluto|| that limits total CPU requests to ||2|| cores and total memory requests to ||1Gi||.

validations.command: kubectl get resourcequota compute-quota -n pluto -o jsonpath='{.spec.hard.requests\.cpu}'
validations.description: ResourceQuota should limit CPU requests to 2 cores

validations.command: kubectl get resourcequota compute-quota -n pluto -o jsonpath='{.spec.hard.requests\.memory}'
validations.description: ResourceQuota should limit memory requests to 1Gi
